entry.title: Current Conditions: 15.9°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Rain beginning late this evening then changing to flurries before morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
